replies.body:
Pie, you're a great friend, a smart kid, and a great leader. You will do great things in life.

The focus of avicus? I'm not too into being in a fame position so if you mean like being admin or something, I'm not interested. I prefer to help avicus from the inside.

Well for the moderators, hack detection. For the senior staff team, communication and problem solving.

I believe you and rese have done a great job with the community slack. Keep it up!

replies.body:
Vo! I haven't talked you since I left the event team; but I enjoyed fighting for our beliefs when the official team was invaded, even if it did cost me. A lot. Anyway... questions!

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. Have you ever been stung by a bee?
  4. What is your favourite breakfast food?
  5. Are you still learning who you are?
  6. Glass half full or half empty? Or is the glass just malformed?
  7. What was your impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Keep up your amazing work as both moderator and official! Have a good one! :D

Take it easy, - Aura
